name: firefox-addon-radiognu
title: RadioGNU Scrobbler
description:
RadioGNU Scrobbler for Libre.fm.
 
GNU FM is free software for running music community websites. It was created for the music community site, Libre.fm
author: Alexander J. Salas B.

preferences.name: username
preferences.title: Username on Libre.fm
preferences.description: This username is used to generate de session of the scrobbler.

preferences.name: notifications
preferences.title: Track notification change
preferences.description: This option enable native notification in the browser.
